item.title: President Zelensky: Massive combined strike on all regions of Ukraine. During the night and this morning, Russian terrorists ... (LiveUAMap)
item.description: President Zelensky: Massive combined strike on all regions of Ukraine. During the night and this morning, Russian terrorists used drones of various types, including Shaheds. Cruise, ballistic and aeroballistic missiles: Tsyrkon, Iskander, Kinzhal. In total, about 120 missiles and 90 drones. Our air defense forces destroyed more than 140 air targets. The target was our energy infrastructure throughout Ukraine
